items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: Users can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who sees their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with GDPR

items.title: Friends and Following System
items.description: Allow users to connect with friends and follow other users to see their activities.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search for other users by name or email
Users can send and accept friend requests
Following a user displays their public activities in the feed
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 friend connections per user

notes: Assumed that core fitness tracking features already exist and the focus is on adding social interaction capabilities.
